text: The Niger national under-17 football team represents Niger in youth international football completions. They have qualified for the FIFA U-17 World Cup in 2017 and made the Round of 16. == Tournament Records == === FIFA U-17 World Cup record === FIFA U-17 World Cup FIFA U-17 World Cup FIFA U-17 World
